summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Mar de Cortez e-procurement system iteration 2. Major improvements achieved - authentication persistence issues from iteration 1 have been completely resolved. Backend remains 100% functional, frontend now 95% functional with only minor UX issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selection in product creation dialog requires keyboard navigation instead of mouse clicks

issues: Marine theme implemented correctly with ocean gradient backgrounds
Professional design with proper spacing and typography
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
affected_screen: All pages - design is consistent and professional

passed_tests: Backend API Product CRUD operations - 100% success
Frontend Landing page loading and navigation - 100% success
Frontend Login form and authentication - 100% success
Frontend Session persistence during navigation - 100% success (MAJOR FIX)
Frontend Product management (create, view, edit, delete) - 95% success
Frontend Navigation between all pages - 100% success
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UX improvement needed: Fix product category dropdown selection to work with mouse clicks instead of requiring keyboard navigation. This is a low priority cosmetic issue.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major functionality working, minor dropdown UX issue
